thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Nikita Lafleur
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Nikita Lafleur

author: Nikita Lafleur
title: Nikita Lafleur
text: I love this company! They worked with me and handled my problem within 2 minutes! Very friendly and honest with me. I purchased an iTunes card and there was a defect and they immediately took my screen shot and contacted the manufacturer and then issued me a replacement card. Very honest they were with me. I have purchased iTunes cards at Apple and they were nasty with me and treated me horribly!
